Text:
Despite the chill of winter, the castle is warm and
colorful flowers are in bloom.
It's winter now, right?

The temperature is maintained by an artifact beneath
the ground.
Uh huh...

Um! Your performance earlier was very
impressive.

I have no doubt you'll become a world-class pianist
right away! I've never heard anyone play as
wonderfully as you!

(That's only because compared to modern-day Japan,
performing arts in this world still have a long way
to go...)

I also happened to overhear that you've caught Earl
Parton's eye!

Enter the employ of his house and you can easily
earn a yearly stipend of 100 million zeni!
100 million zeni?!
And annually, at that...

Marquis Newwealth was also most impressed. His offer
would be a little less at 70 million zeni, but he is
a man of many connections, so if it's fame you seek,
then he's your best choice!

(The musician's route, huh... Getting a yearly salary
would mean not having to hope people feel generous,
so it could actually work.)
I also heartily recommend my own household!
Your house...?

Your base stipend would start at 50 million a year,
but I'm certain that I can persuade him to increase
it to 70 million!
He can afford that...?

Just between the two of us, I happen to be on good
terms with both Earl Parton and Marquis Newwealth.

So if you put your faith in me, everything will go
swimmingly.
Yeah, but I'm not sure Shiron would like that.

Only because she wants to keep her dear apprentice
all to herself!
Don't you worry! Just leave everything to me, okay?
I will do everything in my power to support you...
Um... Huh?
By the way, you're Princess Rose's maid, right?
Where is the princess now?
Grr...
You have an interest in Princess Rose, do you?
I dislike her very much.

I've been in charge of the princess's care since
before she went to study in Midgar.

Though she was a bit odd, especially in her affinity
for something so uncultured as swordplay,
Rose was kind, intelligent, and loved by everyone.
But—
Because of her actions, our land is in disarray...
—So you wish to know where the princess is?
Yeah, I guess...
I'm afraid...that is a secret. I cannot tell you.
Really.

But...b-but, maybe this is a little something I can
share...

This would be a special favor for you alone,
understand?

(Just when I thought I'd lost her, she jumps right
back in, sympathetic and even revealing her
weakness.)
(I know what this is...)
Please don't breathe of word of this to anyone, okay?
(This is how people get solicited to join cults.)

Princess Rose is imprisoned at the top of the western
tower.
Remember, this stays between the two of us...

(Never underestimate an experienced maid...
I see where Rose gets it from.)
Hey.
What're you up to, sneakin' around here?
...And you are?
What? Can't you tell?

I'm one of the castle guards. You tellin' me a great
musician like yourself doesn't know even that?!

We dark knights get treated like common footsoldiers
while you jackasses get put on a pedestal! Ain't that
right?!
Um, I'm sorry?

Don't get smart with me, kid. It's guys like me who
keep this kingdom safe. Call us brutes all ya want,
but we put our lives on the line each and every day.

And yet here you dirtbags are, livin' on easy street
drownin' in women!
Um, I'm sorry?

C'mon, be a man and come get some, wuss! Think you
can take down an uncivilized dark knight with those
fancy tunes of yours?!
Um, I'm sorry?

Ha! Pathetic! Your legs are shakin'! You musicians
ain't worth crap, and same goes for art!
Um, I'm sorry?

Now that we're clear on the peckin' order, I don't
ever wanna see you near her again! Me and Margaret
are in love, you hear me?!
I'm...sorry?

And we confirm that love every single day, right here
in this garden!
One look from me, and she turns right around.

I'm sure she's just shy... She always blushes and
runs off. Isn't that cute?

But that's all I need... You get me, right? One look
in her eyes tells me everything!
Ahh, my sweet Margaret.

We haven't said a word to each other yet, but your
love is reachin' me loud and clear, baby!

It musta been scary havin' that creep droolin' over
you, huh? Well, I'll be right there to comfort a-and
caress ya, c-comfort and caress—

(I know everybody has their own way of loving, but
to never doubt the other person's actions...)
—I'll caress ya real good, ehehe...
(True believers really freak me out...)
